definition: snuff colored, sensing an odor by inhaling through the nose, inhale audibly through the nose
details:
adjective
- snuff colored
= synonyms: snuff-brown, mummy-brown, chukker-brown
noun
- sensing an odor by inhaling through the nose
= synonyms: sniff
- finely powdered tobacco for sniffing up the nose
- a pinch of smokeless tobacco inhaled at a single time
- the charred portion of a candlewick
verb
- inhale audibly through the nose
= example: inhale audibly through the nose
= synonyms: sniffle
- sniff or smell inquiringly
= synonyms: snuffle
